mapper.insert:
select PETSITTER_BOARD_SEQ.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO PARTNER_PETSITTER_BOARD VALUES ( #{petsitterBoardNo}, #{petsitterBoardTitle}, #{petsitterAboutMe}, #{lat}, #{lng}, to_date(#{startDate}), to_date(#{endDate}) + 0.99999, #{pNo}, #{petsitterAddr}, #{petsitterAddrDetail} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) AS cnt FROM PARTNER_PETSITTER_BOARD

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, b.* FROM ( SELECT ppb.petsitter_board_no, ppb.petsitter_board_title, ppb.p_no, ppb.petsitter_addr, p.P_NAME, p.P_GRADE, (SELECT LISTAGG(FILEPATH, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY FILEPATH) AS FILEPATH FROM PETSITTER_FILES WHERE PETSITTER_BOARD_NO = ppb.PETSITTER_BOARD_NO) AS filelist, (6371 * acos(cos(CAST(lat AS FLOAT) * 3.141592653589793 / 180.0) * cos( #{lat}37.5338151 * 3.141592653589793 / 180.0) * cos((#{lng}126.8969784 * 3.141592653589793 / 180.0) - (CAST(lng AS FLOAT) * 3.141592653589793 / 180.0)) + sin(CAST(lat AS FLOAT) * 3.141592653589793 / 180.0) * sin(#{lat}37.5338151 * 3.141592653589793 / 180.0))) as distance, pol.petsitter_option FROM PARTNER_PETSITTER_BOARD ppb, PARTNER p, (SELECT PETSITTER_BOARD_NO, no_pet_str || ',' || pickup_str || ',' || large_pet_str || ',' || yard_str || ',' || old_pet_str AS petsitter_option FROM (SELECT petsitter_board_no, no_pet, pickup, large_pet, yard, old_pet, DECODE(no_pet, 'Y', '반려동물없음', 'N', '반려동물있음', 'N') AS no_pet_str, DECODE(pickup, 'Y', '픽업가능', 'N') AS pickup_str, DECODE(large_pet, 'Y', '대형견가능', 'N') AS large_pet_str, DECODE(yard, 'Y', '마당있음', 'N') AS yard_str, DECODE(old_pet, 'Y', '노견케어', 'N') AS old_pet_str FROM PETSITTER_OPTION_TBL
AND NO_PET='Y' AND PICKUP='Y' AND LARGE_PET='Y' AND YARD='Y' AND OLD_PET='Y' )) pol WHERE ppb.P_NO = p.P_NO AND pol.PETSITTER_BOARD_NO = ppb.PETSITTER_BOARD_NO
AND (START_DATE <= #{startDate} AND END_DATE >= #{endDate})
ORDER BY distance) b) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT p.P_NO, SUBSTR(p.p_name,1,1) || LPAD('*', LENGTH(p.p_name)-2, '*') || SUBSTR(p_name, LENGTH(p.p_name), 1) AS p_name, p.P_GENDER, p.PROFILE_PATH, p.LICENSE, p.APPROVE_DATE, ppb.PETSITTER_BOARD_TITLE, ppb.PETSITTER_ABOUT_ME, ppb.LAT, ppb.LNG, TO_CHAR(ppb.START_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as start_date, TO_CHAR(ppb.END_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as end_date, ppb.PETSITTER_ADDR, (SELECT LISTAGG(FILEPATH , ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY FILEPATH) AS FILEPATH FROM PETSITTER_FILES WHERE PETSITTER_BOARD_NO = #{petsitterBoardNo}) AS filelist, pol.petsitter_option, (SELECT count(*) review_cnt FROM REVIEW_TBL rt WHERE p_no = p.p_no) AS review_cnt FROM PARTNER p , PARTNER_PETSITTER_BOARD ppb, (SELECT PETSITTER_BOARD_NO, no_pet_str || ',' || pickup_str || ',' || large_pet_str || ',' || yard_str || ',' || old_pet_str AS petsitter_option FROM (SELECT petsitter_board_no, no_pet, pickup, large_pet, yard, old_pet, DECODE(no_pet, 'Y', '반려동물없음', 'N', '반려동물있음', 'N') AS no_pet_str, DECODE(pickup, 'Y', '픽업가능', 'N') AS pickup_str, DECODE(large_pet, 'Y', '대형견가능', 'N') AS large_pet_str, DECODE(yard, 'Y', '마당있음', 'N') AS yard_str, DECODE(old_pet, 'Y', '노견케어', 'N') AS old_pet_str FROM PETSITTER_OPTION_TBL) WHERE PETSITTER_BOARD_NO = #{petsitterBoardNo}) pol WHERE p.P_NO = ppb.P_NO AND ppb.PETSITTER_BOARD_NO = #{petsitterBoardNo}
